hero.subtitle: Ph.D. Candidate, Applied Science & Technology
hero.institution: North Carolina Agricultural and Technical State University
hero.description: Doctoral Research Fellow specializing in critical quantitative methods, machine learning, and data justice. Integrating ecological development with human-centered data analysis.

timeline.title: Mathematics Educator
timeline.desc: High School Math Teacher at Guilford County Schools. Achieved >30% student growth.

timeline.title: Began PhD & IBM Scholar
timeline.desc: Started Ph.D. at NC A&T. Selected as IBM-HBCU Quantum Center Graduate Scholar.

timeline.title: Innovation Team Lead
timeline.desc: Led cross-disciplinary team to develop Grad Mgmt App. Winner of SciTech Innovation Challenge.

timeline.title: Research Fellow & Author
timeline.desc: Published in 'Analytics'. Leading mixed-methods study on Black STEM undergraduates.

timeline.title: PhD Candidate
timeline.desc: Anticipated graduation in Applied Science & Technology - STEM Education.

projects.title: NSF Data Text Mining
projects.desc: Modeling project using national publication data to examine predictors of scientific impact. Applied text mining and time-series anomaly detection.

projects.title: Grad Mgmt Mobile App
projects.desc: Led development of a mobile app to reduce attrition and streamline degree progress. 1st Place Winner, SciTech Innovation Challenge.

projects.title: Black epiSTEMologies
projects.desc: Managed collaborative research analyzing racialized experiences in STEM higher education using statistical and qualitative methods.
